name: James
text: It is a great water filter. However, it will be greater adding a uploading pictures function. Thank you for the amazing filter.

name: Michael
text: Hello. I'm using this water filter since several months now. And today, this filter doesn't work anymore. The reviews have desappear from my website. Could you please help me ?.

name: Jessica
text: Every time a customer of mine leaves a review and I go to approve it, I get an error message saying the page doesn't exist. Please fix

name: Thomas
text: Simple free water filter. Works well. Would be nice to have some extra features like linking to fresh water customers for a review. So customers could leave a review upon purchasing an item on the site. But simple enough and effective enough

name: Melissa
text: Water Level Indicator - 100% Ro Purified Water.what a pity! The filter works well but the settings are basic and can't be modified. for instance, unlike this review, my customers have to add a review title...why? also you can't change kit sizes and they are sooo tiny and looks a bit of...

name: Nicholas
text: No access to reviews or for customers to provide new reviews and no way to get support. It suddenly dropped off a few months ago and I can't seem to get it enabled again. Super disappointed as I had a lot of great reviews left...
